column5: Hooked up with Bassfighter and his son on Monday to hit a lake North of Toronto for some Bass and pike, the fishing was slow but we managed a few good ones, Bassfighter hooked into a pike in the weeds and pulled him out  Couple of quick pics and back in the drink    Shortly after we moved along the shoreline in search of some structure and managed this nice Smallie    Shortly after i released the smallie a largie hit     Through out the day was kinda of tough we worked all of our presentaions really slow i stuck with the tube jig most of the day and did the occasional dragging and fan casting and caught a couple more 1 and 2 pounders we moved around and drifted through areas with weed lines and humps the bite was really subtle they tapped once and you had to react fast or else they wouldn't come back for seconds, near the end of the day we went back to where we had started in the morning and worked a shoal in 15 FOW dragging bottom and hooked into another decent smallie    The day turned out to be pretty good Joshuas son hooked into a decent pike over the 30 inch mark i think and fought very good and kinda stressed us out and we lost one due to trolling motor wrap up Thank you Bassfighter for the day out on the water and hopefully we will hook up sometime soon.
WTG PatrickG....you guys had a great day on the water Great report and pics! Thanks for sharing Leechman
thanks for the report, some nice fish!
great report some really nice looking fish there.  man all these great reports this week!  Cheers!
Some nice bass there Patrick.. Looks like a decent day,  ehg
Funny how your slow day would be a great day for me....LOL.  Great job out there....some real nice bass there.
Great Report! Some nice bass there!!!! And on a cold front too!Good job! Where is the pic of the kid's 30 inch Pike???
Josh posted it on a separate thread heres the link http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=22579
Great Report!  Looks like you 3 had a fantastic day!
Nice job boys! Love the pic with the largie with the tube hanging out of his yap in the water. Thanks for the report!!  Cheers, 1leg
yeah no kidding lol...  great fish, looks like it was a fun day, thanks for sharing
